013package org.apache.juneau.http.header;
014
015import java.util.*;
016import java.util.function.*;
017
018import org.apache.juneau.*;
019import org.apache.juneau.assertions.*;
020import org.apache.juneau.common.internal.*;
021import org.apache.juneau.http.annotation.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
023
024/**
025 * Represents a parsed <l>Client-Version</l> HTTP request header.
026 *
027 * <p>
028 * Specifies a client-side version number.
029 *
030 * <h5 class='figure'>Example</h5>
031 * <p class='bcode'>
032 *    Client-Version: 2.0.1
033 * </p>
034 *
035 * <p>
036 * Not part of the RFC2616 specification, but provided to allow for HTTP responses to be tailored to specified
037 * known client versions.
038 *
039 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
040 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauRestCommonBasics">juneau-rest-common</a>
041 * </ul>
042 *
043 * @serial exclude
044 */
045@Header("Client-Version")
046public class ClientVersion extends BasicStringHeader {
047
048   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
049   // Static
050   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
051
052   private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
053   private static final String NAME = "Client-Version";
054
055   private static final Cache<String,ClientVersion> CACHE = Cache.of(String.class, ClientVersion.class).build();
056
057   /**
058    * Static creator.
059    *
060    * @param value
061    *    The header value.
062    *    <br>Must be parsable by {@link Version#of(String)}
063    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
064    * @return A new header bean, or <jk>null</jk> if the value is <jk>null</jk>.
065    */
066   public static ClientVersion of(String value) {
067      return value == null ? null : CACHE.get(value, ()->new ClientVersion(value));
068   }
069
070   /**
071    * Static creator.
072    *
073    * @param value
074    *    The header value.
075    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
076    * @return A new header bean, or <jk>null</jk> if the value is <jk>null</jk>.
077    */
078   public static ClientVersion of(Version value) {
079      return value == null ? null : new ClientVersion(value);
080   }
081
082   /**
083    * Static creator with delayed value.
084    *
085    * <p>
086    * Header value is re-evaluated on each call to {@link #getValue()}.
087    *
088    * @param value
089    *    The supplier of the header value.
090    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
091    * @return A new header bean, or <jk>null</jk> if the value is <jk>null</jk>.
092    */
093   public static ClientVersion of(Supplier<Version> value) {
094      return value == null ? null : new ClientVersion(value);
095   }
096
097   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
098   // Instance
099   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
100
101   private final Version value;
102   private final Supplier<Version> supplier;
103
104   /**
105    * Constructor.
106    *
107    * @param value
108    *    The header value.
109    *    <br>Must be parsable by {@link Version#of(String)}
110    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
111    */
112   public ClientVersion(String value) {
113      super(NAME, value);
114      this.value = Version.of(value);
115      this.supplier = null;
116   }
117
118   /**
119    * Constructor.
120    *
121    * @param value
122    *    The header value.
123    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
124    */
125   public ClientVersion(Version value) {
126      super(NAME, Utils.s(value));
127      this.value = value;
128      this.supplier = null;
129   }
130
131   /**
132    * Constructor with delayed value.
133    *
134    * <p>
135    * Header value is re-evaluated on each call to {@link #getValue()}.
136    *
137    * @param value
138    *    The supplier of the header value.
139    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
140    */
141   public ClientVersion(Supplier<Version> value) {
142      super(NAME, (String)null);
143      this.value = null;
144      this.supplier = value;
145   }
146
147   @Override /* Header */
148   public String getValue() {
149      if (supplier != null)
150         return Utils.s(supplier.get());
151      return super.getValue();
152   }
153
154   /**
155    * Returns the header value as a {@link Version} object.
156    *
157    * @return The header value as a {@link Version} object, or {@link Optional#empty()} if the value is <jk>null</jk>.
158    */
159   public Optional<Version> asVersion() {
160      return Utils.opt(value);
161   }
162
163   /**
164    * Provides the ability to perform fluent-style assertions on this header.
165    *
166    * <h5 class='section'>Examples:</h5>
167    * <p class='bjava'>
168    *    <jc>// Validates the response content is older than 1.</jc>
169    *    <jv>client</jv>
170    *       .get(<jsf>URL</jsf>)
171    *       .run()
172    *       .getHeader(ClientVersion.<jk>class</jk>).assertVersion().major().isGreaterThan(1);
173    * </p>
174    *
175    * @return A new fluent assertion object.
176    * @throws AssertionError If assertion failed.
177    */
178   public FluentVersionAssertion<ClientVersion> assertVersion() {
179      return new FluentVersionAssertion<>(asVersion().orElse(null), this);
180   }
181}
